main.name: Mark Hodge
main.occupation: Software Engineer, Helicopter Pilot, and I built this website too.
main.bio: Results-driven software engineer and U.S. Army National Guard helicopter pilot with 4+ years of experience delivering enterprise-grade software solutions in Agile environments. Demonstrated ability to lead end-to-end project execution, from development through deployment, across cloud-native and on-prem infrastructures using CI/CD pipelines, Kubernetes, and Google Cloud Platform. As a commissioned officer and executive officer in an aviation unit, brings disciplined leadership, operational planning, and risk management honed through flight operations and mission readiness. Combines technical fluency with strategic thinking and cross-functional collaboration to solve complex problems and drive high-impact initiatives forward in dynamic, fast-paced settings.

experience.description: Led the planning, development, and deployment of new software features and bug fixes in Agile sprints, improving delivery consistency and team coordination. Managed sprint ceremonies, tracked progress using DevOps metrics, and oversaw microservices rollouts to Google Kubernetes Engine and on-prem environments via CI/CD pipelines, ensuring smooth releases and system stability through close collaboration with DevOps, QA, and security teams.

experience.company: J. B. Hunt Transportation Services Inc.
